talk.author: did:plc:pgyk5obfittr26onudcg36fi
talk.utter:
And no blocklist is perfect. I've seen good people end up on them. Being able to manually unblock someone from a blocklist is paramount. 

I also had a friend get added to a blocklist that turned malicious. Then the blocklist was deleted. Now I can't unblock the friend at all.

talk.author: did:plc:xjcsnbpzq6ejhjaxny6bizl3
talk.utter: You can go to settings and moderation and find your blocklist, but there's no search so you'll just have to scroll until you find you friend

talk.author: did:plc:pgyk5obfittr26onudcg36fi
talk.utter:
No, there's a blocklist section and then a seperate section for your manual blocks. You can remove the block list from the block list section. But the block list no longer exists to remove it. But the block is still in place from the blocklist. 

So it's impossible to remove the block.
